title: Autechre Expand 2025 North American Tour
description: Due to popular demand, the English electronic music duo has added performances in new cities and larger venues
author: Madison Bloom
excerpt: Due to popular demand, the English electronic music duo has added performances in new cities and larger venues
text: Tickets went fast for Autechre’s highly anticipated North American tour, so they’re making their return to the United States and Canada even bigger. The English electronic music duo has added shows in Seattle, Los Angeles, New York, New Orleans, and more. Autechre have also booked larger venues in Denver, Chicago, and Boston. Find Autechre’s updated itinerary below.Autechre’s most recent U.S. concert took place in 2015. For their upcoming North American shows, they’ll have support from the British DJ and producer Mark Broom, while the artist Russell Haswell is joining for select European and UK dates.All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.Autechre: TwentyTwentyFive TourAutechre:08-06 Amsterdam, Netherlands - Melkweg +08-08 Helsinki, Finland - Flow Festival08-10 Warsaw, Poland - Progresja +08-13 Berlin, Germany - Astra +08-15 Reykjavík, Iceland - Harpa10-01 Denver, CO - Ogden Theatre *10-03 Minneapolis, MN - Icehouse *10-05 Vancouver, British Columbia - Hollywood Theatre *10-06 Seattle, WA - The Crocodile *10-06 Seattle, WA - The Crocodile *10-07 Portland, OR - The Den *10-09 San Francisco, CA - The Regency Ballroom *10-10 Los Angeles, CA - Belasco *10-10 Los Angeles, CA - Belasco *10-12 Mexico City, Mexico - Mutek Festival *10-14 Austin, TX - Kingdom *10-15 New Orleans, LA - Joy Theater *10-16 Birmingham, AL - Saturn *10-17 Atlanta, GA - Terminal West *10-18 Louisville, KY - Portal *10-20 Chicago, IL - Concord Music Hall *10-21 Detroit, MI - Building 6 at Russell Industrial Center *10-22 Toronto, Ontario - Danforth Hall *10-24 Montreal, Quebec - SAT *10-25 Brooklyn, NY - Brooklyn Steel *10-25 Brooklyn, NY - Brooklyn Steel *10-26 Philadelphia, PA - Union Transfer *10-27 Boston, MA - Paradise *10-28 Portsmouth, NH - 3S *10-29 Washington, D.C. - The Howard Theatre *11-02 Glasgow, Scotland - SWG3 *+11-03 Newcastle, England - Digital *11-04 Leeds, England - Project House *11-05 Brighton, England - Chalk *11-06 Bristol, England - Prospect *11-07 Belfast, Northern Ireland - Mandela Hall ** with Mark Broom+ with Russell Haswell
html:
Tickets went fast for Autechre’s highly anticipated North American tour, so they’re making their return to the United States and Canada even bigger. The English electronic music duo has added shows in Seattle, Los Angeles, New York, New Orleans, and more. Autechre have also booked larger venues in Denver, Chicago, and Boston. Find Autechre’s updated itinerary below.

Autechre’s most recent U.S. concert took place in 2015. For their upcoming North American shows, they’ll have support from the British DJ and producer Mark Broom, while the artist Russell Haswell is joining for select European and UK dates.

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Autechre: TwentyTwentyFive Tour
